title: Other Resources
description: Other Destiny resources that deserve a mention.

resources.name: Vault Item Manager
resources.description: Lightning-fast item manager app for Destiny.

resources.name: light.gg
resources.description: The ultimate database for Destiny. Find weapons, quests, and more.

resources.name: Raid Report
resources.description: A summary of Raid statistics for Destiny. Look up raid clears, speedruns, and sherpas.

resources.name: Party Randomizer
resources.description: Randomize your Destiny 2 loadout!

resources.name: D2Gunsmith
resources.description: A Destiny 2 weapon crafting simulation tool.

resources.name: Rollfinder
resources.description: Find your god rolls in Destiny. Includes unique filters, the option search per stats and an up-to-date database!

resources.name: D2Checklist
resources.description: A report on Destiny 2 progress & stats. Includes PvP, Raids, weekly PvE activities, and more.

resources.name: aiobungie
resources.description: API wrapper for Destiny 2, utilizing Python and asyncio.

resources.name: Quria
resources.description: User-friendly Destiny 2 API wrapper, written in TypeScript.

resources.name: Destiny Emblem Collector
resources.description: The ultimate repository for Destiny emblems: how they look like, how to get them, and whether they're still available.

resources.name: The Cosmodrome
resources.description: Directory of third-party Destiny resources.

resources.name: Legionless
resources.description: Helping Destiny players conquer various Lost Sectors across the Sol System.

resources.name: rich-destiny
resources.description: Discord rich presence utility app for Destiny 2.

resources.name: lowlidev
resources.description: Multi-purpose tool for Destiny 2. Includes Gear Viewer, collectibles, maps, and more.

resources.name: Shattered Vault
resources.description: A Destiny resource that aims to provide weekly reset information, essential guides, and links to popular third-party apps.

resources.name: DotNetBungieAPI
resources.description: .NET Destiny API wrapper.

resources.name: Redrix
resources.description: A Destiny app which provides tools to improve your PvP skills. Also includes leaderboards!

resources.name: D2ArmorPicker
resources.description: Optimize your Destiny 2 loadout stats with just a few clicks.

resources.name: glory.report
resources.description: A resource of PvP tools for Destiny. Includes player encounters, daily reports, and more.

resources.name: Destiny History
resources.description: A tool to highlight the history of Destiny, with a timeline tailored for you.

resources.name: Marvin
resources.description: A Destiny Discord bot created to help promote activity and healthy competition between clanmates.

resources.name: Braytech
resources.description: Powerful Destiny application that allows users to view and map checklists, track and view triumphs, inspect collectibles, and so much more.

resources.name: Destiny Command
resources.description: A chat bot that you can install anywhere. It allows you and your viewers to check stats across Destiny, be it Trials stats, K/D, loadout or even just medals.

resources.name: strike.farm
resources.description: A Destiny tool that allows you to make the daily Strike modifiers work in your favor!
